definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Sciatica resolves on its own in three weeks in 75% of cases.
sentences.chinese: 75%的坐骨神经痛会在三周内不治而愈。

sentences.english: The highest stress was found at the tuberodties of ischium.
sentences.chinese: 此时的坐骨结节处承受较大压应力。

sentences.english: Objective: To repair the bedsores on the ischial tuberosities.
sentences.chinese: 目的修复坐骨结节褥疮。

sentences.english: The sick cow frequently attempts urination and pulsates the urethra over the ischium arch.
sentences.chinese: 病牛频频企图排尿，搏动坐骨弓上的尿道。

sentences.english: The sick cow frequently attempts urination and pulsates the urethra over the ischium arch.
sentences.chinese: 病牛频频企图排尿，坐骨弓上的尿道发生搏动。

sentences.english: The puncture to the ischium was from ischium tubercle to the lesions.
sentences.chinese: 内侧髋臼穿刺应自坐骨结节，经坐骨升支抵达病变区。

sentences.english: The puncture to the ischium was from ischium tubercle to the lesions.
sentences.chinese: 内侧髋臼穿刺应自坐骨结节，经坐骨升支抵达病变区。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of electrical acupuncture on ischiodynia of cold-dampness type.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察电热针治疗寒湿型坐骨神经痛的疗效。

sentences.english: Keep the center of your front heel aligned with your ipsilateral sitting bone.
sentences.chinese: 保持前腿跟的中心正对着你同一侧的坐骨。

sentences.english: The differential diagnosis of sciatica of nerve roots and nerve trunk.
sentences.chinese: 根性及干性坐骨神经痛的鉴别。

sentences.english: At the top of them, tendons attach all three to the sitting bones.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的顶端，靠肌腱连接到坐骨上。

sentences.english: Left sciatic nerves were cut down on germfree conditions and given primary suture of epineurium.
sentences.chinese: 无菌条件下切断左侧坐骨神经，一期神经外膜缝合。

sentences.english: I totally agree that at all time the inside seat bone should bare more weight while the horse is cantering.
sentences.chinese: 我完全赞成在跑步过程中内方坐骨承受更多重量。
我妈的坐骨神经痛又犯了。

sentences.english: The clistressed cow frequently attempts urination and pulsates the urethra over the ischial arch.
sentences.chinese: 病牛频频企图排尿，坐骨弓上的尿道发生搏动。

sentences.english: Each rat underwent right sciatic nerve transection.
sentences.chinese: 显露每只动物的右侧坐骨神经，利刀横断。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
